description:
cmd/go: many improvements

* correct dependency calculations
* comment meaning of action fields
* new alias "std" like "all" but standard packages only
* add -o flag to 'go build'
* set up for parallel build (still serial)
* understand that import "C" depends on cgo, runtime/cgo

messages.text:
*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=06cd7096c292 ***

cmd/go: many improvements

* correct dependency calculations
* comment meaning of action fields
* new alias "std" like "all" but standard packages only
* add -o flag to 'go build'
* set up for parallel build (still serial)
* understand that import "C" depends on cgo, runtime/cgo

R=golang-dev, mikioh.mikioh
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5502055

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

This may also help the windows/amd64 build, because it will
name the intermediate test binary a.out.exe instead of just a.out.

On Wed, Dec 21, 2011 at 07:21,  <mikioh.mikioh@gmail.com> wrote:
> LGTM after re-sync, re-run src/buildscript.sh

Thanks.  I am going to submit this to see what effect
it has on the Windows build.  I'm happy to apply comments
from others later today.

Russ

subject: code review 5502055: cmd/go: many improvements
